com.classic.core.log

类 Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.classic.core.log.Logger

  • public final class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Logger is a wrapper of Log But more pretty, simple and powerful

        public static Settings init()

      • init

        It is used to change the tag

        tag - is the given string which will be used in Logger as TAG
